<title level="2" right="Creature 12">[Wight Cultist](/Monsters.aspx?ID=2116)</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Rare" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=137" />
<trait label="NE" url="/Rules.aspx?ID=95" />
<trait label="Medium" />
<trait label="Undead" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=160" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Pathfinder #154: Siege of the Dinosaurs](/Sources.aspx?ID=31) pg. 34</row>

**Perception** +22; [darkvision](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=12)

**Languages**
[Common](/Languages.aspx?ID=1)

**Skills**
[Athletics](/Skills.aspx?ID=3) +25, [Intimidation](/Skills.aspx?ID=7) +24, [Occultism](/Skills.aspx?ID=11) +17, [Stealth](/Skills.aspx?ID=15) +22

<row gap="medium">
**Str** +7

**Dex** +4

**Con** +6

**Int** -1

**Wis** +6

**Cha** +4
</row>

**Items**
_+1 [striking](/Equipment.aspx?ID=280) [ranseur](/Weapons.aspx?ID=35)_, platinum [religious symbol](/Equipment.aspx?ID=41) of Bokrug worth 150 gp

</column>

---

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="medium">
**AC** 32 

**Fort** +24 

**Ref** +20 

**Will** +22 

</row>

**HP** 235
([negative healing](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=42))

**Immunities**
[death](/Traits.aspx?ID=40) effects, [disease](/Traits.aspx?ID=46), [paralyzed](/Conditions.aspx?ID=28), [poison](/Traits.aspx?ID=126), [unconscious](/Conditions.aspx?ID=38)

**Dreadful Spite** <actions string="Reaction" /> **Trigger** The wight cultist is reduced to 0 Hit Points; **Effect** The wight makes a Strike before being destroyed. It doesn't gain any temporary HP from drain life on this Strike. A creature hit by this Strike is also [doomed 1](/Conditions.aspx?ID=9) for 1 minute.

</column>

---

<column gap="tiny">

**Speed** 25 feet

**Melee**
<actions string="Single Action" />
_ranseur_ +26 ([Disarm](/Traits.aspx?ID=175), [Magical](/Traits.aspx?ID=103), [Reach](/Traits.aspx?ID=192)),
**Damage** 2d10+13 piercing plus drain life

**Melee**
<actions string="Single Action" />
claw +25,
**Damage** 3d6+13 bludgeoning plus drain life

**Divine Innate Spells** DC 29
- **Cantrips (6th)**
[Daze](/Spells.aspx?ID=61), [Shield](/Spells.aspx?ID=280)
- **3rd**
[Paralyze](/Spells.aspx?ID=213) (at will)
- **5th**
[Confusion](/Spells.aspx?ID=48), [Downpour](/Spells.aspx?ID=417)
- **6th**
[Crushing Despair](/Spells.aspx?ID=57)

**Drain Life**  ([Divine](/Traits.aspx?ID=48), [Necromancy](/Traits.aspx?ID=117)) When the wight damages a living creature with its claw or _ranseur_ Strike, the wight gains 12 temporary Hit Points and the creature must succeed at a DC 29 Fortitude save or become [drained 1](/Conditions.aspx?ID=10). Further damage dealt by the wight increases the amount of drain by 1 on a failed save, to a maximum of drained 4.

**Wight Spawn**  ([Divine](/Traits.aspx?ID=48), [Necromancy](/Traits.aspx?ID=117)) A living [humanoid](/Traits.aspx?ID=91) slain by a wight's claw or _ranseur_ Strike rises as a wight after 1d4 rounds. This wight spawn is under the command of the wight that killed it. It doesn't have drain life or wight spawn and becomes [clumsy 2](/Conditions.aspx?ID=3) for as long as it is a wight spawn. If the creator of the wight spawn dies, the wight spawn becomes a full-fledged, autonomous wight; it regains its free will, gains drain life and wight spawn, and is no longer clumsy

</column>
name: Wight Cultist
